mapper.select: SELECT comment_seq, pseq, content, writer, regdate, modifydate FROM (SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY regdate DESC) rn, comment_seq, pseq, content, writer, regdate, modifydate FROM product_comment WHERE pseq=#{pseq}) WHERE rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM product_comment WHERE pseq = #{pseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_comment(comment_seq, pseq, content, writer) VALUES(prod_comment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pseq}, #{content}, #{writer})
